issue.subject: Removing PdfServlet
issue.description:
PdfServlet is a current EasySDI java servlet which allows to export metadata in pdf format based on FOP open source project http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/.
Such pdf metadata export feature is also available in easySDI based on php MPDF open source project http://www.mpdf1.com/mpdf/index.php

Having deployed several metadata catalogues with both technologies, our feedback is that deploying/manipulating FOP is more painful than using MPDF. Also using FOP inside easySDI does not increase time response when generating metadata in pdf format.
So we propose to remove FOP java API and to keep pdf export feature through MPDF php API only.

May I ask EasySDI Steering Committee to give back his advice and vote about removing PdfServlet ?
+1 = remove PdfServlet from EasySDI v3
0  = no advice
-1 = keep PdfServlet inside EasySDI v3


Thanks a lot,
Bruno

journals.notes:
+1 to remove FOP.

We could also analyse if mpdf can be replace by BIRT used in the DASHBORD?

Considering that we :

- do not use all FOP features and strenghs,
- do not produce big PDF files (metadata have generally 2-3 pages)
- want to simplify the EasySDI deployement process

I vote +1.

_Side effect not to forget : current XSL sent to FOP will need some adaptations._

+1

My opinion is that BIRT suits especially for reporting and MPDF suits specifically for PDF export based on XML/XHTML source document.
